Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.label: Social Preference
Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.description: Represents the drive this person has to work for the community or for themselves.

Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.label: Work Approach
Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.description: Represents the person's approach to their work balance between disciplined structure and relaxed flexibility.

Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.label: Work Environment Aesthetic
Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.description: Represents the preference for work environments, ranging from organic, nature-infused settings to mechanized, industrial ones.

Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.label: Cognitive Orientation
Autonomy.WorkdrivePreferenceAxisDef.description: Represents the person's approach to thinking and problem solving.
